messages.content:
Parse user command.

Select the correct function from list of available functions based on user command

variable is defined with starting and ending %, e.g. %filePath%

If there is some api key, settings, config replace it with %Settings.Get("settingName", "defaultValue", "Explain")%
where the settingName would be the api key, config key, 
defaultValue is the usual value given, make it "" if no value can be default
Explain is an explanation about the setting that novice user can understand.

Inputs: are parameters that are required for the function and %variables% needed
Outputs: Dictionary<string, string> where key is type of return, value is variable name, if function is not void. Use best matching defined variable, override the variable if needed
FunctionName: Name of the function to use from list of functions, if no function matches set as "N/A"


You MUST respond in JSON, scheme
 "Action": {
  "FunctionName": "String",
  "Inputs": {
    "key": "String",
    "value": "Object"
  },
  "Outputs": {
    "key": "String",
    "value": "Object"
  }
}

## functions available defined in csharp ##
OnAddVariableListener(String key, String goalName, String appName, Dictionary`2 parameters, Boolean? waitForResponse = True, Int32? delayWhenNotWaitingInMilliseconds = 50)
OnChangeVariableListener(String key, String goalName, String appName, Dictionary`2 parameters, Boolean? waitForResponse = True, Int32? delayWhenNotWaitingInMilliseconds = 50)
OnRemoveVariableListener(String key, String goalName, String appName, Dictionary`2 parameters, Boolean? waitForResponse = True, Int32? delayWhenNotWaitingInMilliseconds = 50)
SetVariable(String key, Object value)
GetVariable(String key)
SetStaticVariable(String key, Object value)
GetStaticVariable(String key)
RemoveVariable(String key)
RemoveStaticVariable(String key)

## functions available ends ##
## defined variables ##
{}
## defined variables ##

command: set '{"messages": [{"system":"%item.question.system%", "assistant":"%item.question.assistant%", "user":"%item.question.question%, assistant:%item.question.RawResponse%"}]}'
    into %data%
